description: This file defines a React component for connecting to JIRA and Confluence providers, including a form component with user input handling, feedback alerts, and integration with authentication and API functions.

methods.name: ConnectForm
methods.description: A React component for inputting connection details and submitting them to the parent component.

methods.name: ConnectPage
methods.description: Main page component rendering two ConnectForm instances for JIRA and Confluence, with authentication check.
